name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - K  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a cat?
questions.explanation:
Kaleidoscope.

	Kaleidoscope isn't an ordinary cat, as she is made almost like a quilt.  Her fabric has many different designs, from stripes to polka dots to tie-dye. "I'm wild and crazy as you can seeOther cats want to be like meSome may say I look like a clownBut I'm the coolest cat in town!"

questions.text: Which of these is a camel?
questions.explanation:
Khufu.

	Khufu is a camel with two humps.  His humps are dark brown, but the rest of him is light brown.  He was the August 2003 Beanie of the Month. "There's one thing that I know is trueCamels can have one hump or twoEither way, we love to playOut in the desert sun all day!"

questions.text: Which of these wears a collar?
questions.explanation:
Kippy.

	Kippy is a brown and white dog with a red collar.  He was the September 2003 Beanie of the month. "Sometimes I bark, sometimes I howlOne thing's for sure, I'll never growlI'm the nicest dog you'll ever seeI just want you to play with me!"

questions.text: Which of these wears a scarf?
questions.explanation:
Kirby.

	Kirby is a white terrier puppy.  His scarf is plaid. "Prancing on the icy snowI put on quite a funny showSlipping and sliding all aroundI hope my paws stay on the ground!"

questions.text: Which of these is a bird?
questions.explanation:
Kiwi.

	Kiwi is not a kiwi, but he is a toucan.  He is mostly black with a red chest and underwings, a yellow neck, and a blue beak and feet. "Kiwi waits for the April showersWatching a garden bloom with flowersThere trees grow with fruit that's sweetI'm sure you'll guess his favorite treat!"

questions.text: Which of these is a Borders exclusive?
questions.explanation:
KnOWLedge.

	KnOWLedge is an owl, and he can only be bought at Borders book stores.  He is a snowy owl. "Most every book that I embrace Will take me to a special place Tales of knights or ladies fair Pick up a book and join me there!"

questions.text: Which of these is a common farm animal?
questions.explanation:
Knuckles.

	Knuckles is a pink pig.  Her bow is purple. "In the kitchen working hardUsing ingredients from the yardNo one will eat it, can you guess why?Her favorite recipe is for mud pie!"

questions.text: Which of these is something you would most likely keep as a pet?
questions.explanation:
Kuku.

	Kuku is a cockatoo.  He is mostly white and has pink hair on his head!  The other three were bears, and I certainly hope you don't keep them as pets! "This fancy bird loves to converseHe talks in poems, rhythms and verseSo take him home and give him some time You'll be surprised how he can rhyme!"

questions.text: Which of these is an Australian/New Zealand exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Koowee.

	Koowee is a koala, and koalas are native to Australia.  He has the Union Jack on his right hip to show he is Australian. "Eating gum leaves, sleeping in treesRelaxing in the Aussie breezeWatching as the branches swayThat's how I like to spend my day!"

questions.text: Which of these is a frog?
questions.explanation:
Kissable.

	Kissable is the only frog in the list, as the other three are bears.  Kissable is pink, and wears a pink bow with spots on it.  She also wears a golden crown with a felt heart on it. "I wouldn't want to be remissSo I'll give you a little kissNo one's more kissable than youSo pucker up and kiss me too!"
